title: Do you think USB-C becomes the standard and largely replaces all the USBs? - Quora

response.answer_text: While many of the manufacturers have already adopted it for the smartphones and tablets, there are companies who still prefer either Micro USB or Lightning ports. It is weird how and why they do it because this company’s laptops have USB Type C and their phones have Lightning ports. USB-C cost has to (probably) come down so that every budget device can have a Type C port. But yes, eventually Type C will become a standard (unless some superior technology is pushed for mass manufacturing) Let us see.
